title: Country editor
creator_credit: Film Australia, Peter Johnson and Rob Bow
brief_description: Captures the hectic life of the ‘The Standard’ newspaper editor in the country Victorian town of Boort. Photography by Peter Sykes. Script by Noel Field and Geoff Taylor.
